Row.Text: We have founded the new City of {1_CityName}!
We have founded the new Colony of {1_CityName}!
City is a [ICON_JFD_COLONY] Colony! You may only purchase items in this city whilst it is in this state.

By turning the City into a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Colony[ENDCOLOR], it will generate Gold, Science, Culture, etc. for you, but you [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]may not choose what it produces[ENDCOLOR]. You may still purchase items in it, however.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It will contribute much less [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] than an Annexed City, and will not increase the cost of your Social Policies and Great People. If you choose this, you may later Assimilate the City at any point.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Colonizing this City will increase [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness by {1_Num}.
Are you sure you want to integrate this [ICON_JFD_COLONY] Colony into the empire?
It will cost you {1_Num} [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrate(s), {2_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
Will integrate this [ICON_JFD_COLONY] Colony as a regular City, removing all associated effects.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Cost to Decolonize:
Will integrate this [ICON_JFD_COLONY] Colony as a regular City, removing all associated effects. The city will begin as a [ICON_JFD_COUNTY] County.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Cost to Decolonize:
The Colony of [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_CityName}[ENDCOLOR] has been decolonized nas has joined our civilization.

Replace.Text: {1_Num : number "#.##"} generated by [ICON_CITIZEN] Population of [ICON_PUPPET] Puppet Cities and [ICON_JFD_COLONY] Colonies.

Row.Text: The number of tiles that this Unit is from the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital and the number of tiles before it will found a [ICON_JFD_COLONY] Colony ({1_Num}/{2_Num}).
The number of tiles that this Unit is from the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital ({1_Num}).
